description: Test cases extracted from ClinVar HGVS expressions
note: Expanded fixture with 500+ pathogenic variants covering diverse HGVS notations

categories.deletions: Deletions of one or more nucleotides

test_cases.description: CFTR F508del - most common CF mutation
CFTR deep intronic - creates cryptic splice site
Large genomic deletion with uncertain boundaries
ATM splice variant - synonymous creates splice
BRAF V600E - one-letter amino acid notation
CFTR poly-T tract repeat - exact count
HTT CAG repeat - reduced penetrance range
Cis allele - two variants on same chromosome
Trans allele - variants on different chromosomes
Chimeric - two distinct cell populations (double slash)
TP53 multiple variants in cis (3 variants)

edge_cases.description: Ref equals alt - technically valid HGVS
Very deep intronic variant (10kb upstream of exon)
Very deep intronic variant (15kb downstream of exon)
Deletion spanning 5' UTR and CDS boundary
Deletion with explicit length (not yet supported)
FMR1 CGG repeat full mutation (Fragile X)
Duplication with explicit length (not yet supported)
C-terminal extension with new stop position
C-terminal extension with unknown new stop
Uncertain start boundary (biocommons #801) - simple (pos_pos) boundary not yet supported
Uncertain end boundary (biocommons #801) - simple (pos_pos) boundary not yet supported

quirks.description: Known ClinVar-specific patterns and non-standard notations

items.pattern: Protein variants may use both Ter and * for stop codons
Some entries use gene names without accession in clinical context
Deep intronic variants with large offsets
items.handling: Should parse - verify large offset support

items.pattern: Mixed 3-letter and 1-letter amino acid codes in clinical use
Complex exon-level deletions with uncertain intronic breakpoints
C-terminal extensions with substituted amino acid
items.handling: Complex extension format - our model stores direction/count but not the substituted AA
